metadata.title: CVE-2023-50782 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: [Bleichenbacher timing oracle attack against RSA decryption - incompletefix for CVE-2020-25659]

criterions.comment: python-cryptography package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2014-01-12').
